original_title: Professionals Trade Union collective to meet on Monday (10) to decide on ATA, Tax
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Professionals Trade Union collective will meet on Monday (10) evening in Colombo to decide on future trade union action.

Spokesperson for the Government Medical Officers' Association Dr. Chamil Wijesinghe told News 1st that the Anti-Terrorism Bill, Tax Policy among other matters will be taken up for discussion at the meeting.
